text: Nibiramuka bigaragaye ko (abo bombi) bakoze icyaha (cyo kurahira mu binyoma), mujye mushaka abandi babiri (mu bafitanye isano n’uwapfuye) bajye mu cyimbo cyabo, hanyuma barahire ku izina rya Allah (bavuga bati) “Rwose turemeza ko ubuhamya bwacu ari ukuri kurusha ubuhamya bwabo bombi, kandi ntitwarengereye (ukuri); kuko mu by’ukuri (turamutse tubikoze), twaba tubaye mu nkozi z’ibibi.”
